body.name: SmartyPants Multivitamin for Men, Gummies: Omega 3 Fish Oil (EPA/DHA), Methylfolate, CoQ10, Vitamin D3, C, Vitamin B12, B6, Vitamin A, K & Zinc for Immune Support, 180 Gummies (30 Day Supply)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Overnight 4 AM - 8 AM. Order within 4 hrs 44 mins
features: PACKAGING MAY VARY - Fresh New Look, Same Trusted Quality
PREMIUM, SCIENCE-BACKED GUMMY MULTIVITAMIN FOR MEN: SmartyPants Men’s Multi & Omegas is specifically formulated to help fill nutritional gaps in the average diet

WITH 20 NUTRIENTS TO SUPPORT BUSY LIFESTYLES*: Our science-backed formula includes vitamins B12 and D3, as well as CoQ10, lycopene, methylated folate, and omega-3 EPA and DHA all in a delicious serving
BETTER NUTRIENT SOURCES: We include bioavailable forms of high-quality nutrients that are easy for your body to absorb like methylated folate, vitamin B12 as methylcobalamin, D3, and zinc citrate

CERTIFIED CLEAN, THIRD PARTY TESTED FORMULA: Our men’s vitamins are a Clean Label Project Purity Award Winner! Subjected to strict testing for 200+ contaminants and chemicals, so you can be sure you're choosing high quality vitamins you can trust
DELICIOUS TASTE & NON-GMO: Lemon Crème, Blueberry, and Blackberry Flavors with Other Natural Flavors. Adult men take 6 gummies daily. May be taken with or without food
body.description: SmartyPants Men’s Complete is a premium, multifunctional supplement that delivers omega-3s from fish oil, CoQ10 for heart health, lycopene for prostate health and essential nutrients including vitamin B12 to support energy metabolism and vitamin D3 for immunity –all in one delicious gummy.*

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Tasty and Soft
reviews.reviewText: My very first time consuming them it was surprisingly good. Almost like high quality candy gummies. (not overly chewy like haribo) Very tasty, pleasant, and easygoing on the stomach. Almost forgot they were vitamins with how good they were!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Only issue is you have to eat 6 for a serving! I mean these are for adult men so no need to make them taste crazy good which they are. Just load up enough so you only need 3 to sacrifice taste. It’s ok if they are exactly like a candy lol.My wife got these since they are healthy and have the good b12 in them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: These seems to work well and they taste great! The serving size is 6 pieces which isn’t bad considering they taste great and are gumdrop sized.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great for matching the kids while they take their vitamins. Just too many / too sweet
reviews.reviewText: So been looking for vitamins for my son who has ADHD. I ran across Smarty Pants and decided to try them for our kids and bought some for me as well. The vitamins it has is great formula and my kids like theirs. For me it felt like taking 6 gummies was a bit excessive. So I do 3 in the morning & 3 evening. I also felt like they were too sweet for me. I'm taking them to match the kids and might order again. I wish they would make them bigger so you could take less and make them with less sugar.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars If you hate the taste of chewable vitamin's then these are for you!
reviews.reviewText: I have always hated chewable vitamins because they alway have some funky taste. These have changed my mind. These are really good tasting h and easy to chew. I usually don’t give a review unless it is amazing or in some cases a huge disappointment. These very much fall into the 5 star recommendations.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Excellent source of vitamins for the minu system

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Use this every day and it helps my body recover from vigorous exercise.
Very poor bottle opening system. I have bought a bottle and the opening lid is simply not opening. It is so confusing.. I dont know how to open this now.
